channel.title: Softlayer_scale_network_vlan on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_scale_network_vlan on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Network_Vlan
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Network_Vlan Service Datatype Description A scale network VLAN is a VLAN that scaled members will be placed on. Methods createObject Create a network VLAN for a scale group. Once created, the VLAN will be used to scale with. deleteObject Delete this network VLAN reference. Note, this does not affect existing scaled members. Once deleted however, future scaled members will not be placed on this referenced VLAN.

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Network_Vlan
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Network_Vlan Datatype Description Local createDate When this network VLAN reference was created. Type: dateTime deleteFlag When set and true any edit that happens on this object, be it calling edit on this directly or setting as a child while editing a parent object, will end up being a deletion. Type: boolean id The network VLAN reference's internal identifier. Type: integer
